course_title: Topics in Human Health: Critiquing HLTH News
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 30 / Seats Avail: 0Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes:
(This class is only 2CU and will meet on Fridays from 9:15am - 10:55am) 
(We will examine how health research is covered in news articles. We will practice various skills to critically read health news and learn separating real news from exaggerated news. The aim of the course is to encourage curiosity, to increase scientific perceptiveness, to raise communication awareness, and to build critical evaluation skills.)
